results.title: Restenosis and clinical outcome in patients treated with amlodipine after angioplasty: results from the Coronary AngioPlasty Amlodipine REStenosis Study (CAPARES).
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@Restenosis@@@ and clinical outcome in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ after angioplasty: results from the Coronary AngioPlasty @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@REStenosis@@@ Study (CAPARES).

results.title: Pharmacologic effects of calcium channel blockers on restenosis.
results.text_hl: The Coronary Angioplasty @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@Restenosis@@@ Study (CAPARES) is therefore assessing the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a long-acting, third-generation calcium channel blocker in angioplasty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Atheroprotection with amlodipine: cells to lesions and the PREVENT trial. Prospective Randomized Evaluation of the Vascular Effects of Norvasc Trial.
results.text_hl: Recent animal model studies have demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ inhibits the progression of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic lesions@@@ and protects against @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ after angioplasty.

results.title: A pharmacoeconomic evaluation of results from the Coronary Angioplasty Amlodipine Restenosis Study (CAPARES) in Norway and Canada.

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on vascular responses after coronary stenting compared with an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor.
results.text_hl: We compared @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Quinapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077583 @@@quinapril@@@ to determine which is more effective in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ after stenting.

Effect of amlodipine on vascular responses after coronary stenting compared with an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor. Circ J. 2004 Apr;68(4):328-33. PMID: 15056829

results.title: Clinical promise of calcium antagonists in the angioplasty patient.
results.text_hl: The Coronary Angioplasty @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@Restenosis@@@ (CAPARES) trial has been initiated to assess the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ upon the rate of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@/@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ after the procedure.

results.title: An updated meta-analysis of calcium-channel blockers in the prevention of restenosis after coronary angioplasty.
results.text_hl: Recently, the results of 2 large similar trials (@CHEMICAL_Nisoldipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015737 @@@Nisoldipine@@@ In @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@Coronary Artery Disease@@@ in Leuven [NICOLE], and @DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@Coronary AngioPlasty@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@REstenosis@@@ Study [CAPARES]) were published.

citations.NLM: Dens J, Desmet W, Piessens J. An updated meta-analysis of calcium-channel blockers in the prevention of restenosis after coronary angioplasty. Am Heart J. 2003 Mar;145(3):404-8. PMID: 12660661
citations.BibTeX: @article{12660661, title={An updated meta-analysis of calcium-channel blockers in the prevention of restenosis after coronary angioplasty.}, author={Dens J and Desmet W and Piessens J}, journal={Am Heart J}, volume={145}, number={3}, pages={404-8}}

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on gene expression and extracellular matrix formation in human vascular smooth muscle cells and fibroblasts: implications for vascular protection.
results.text_hl: Vascular smooth muscle cells (VSMC) are involved in the pathogenesis of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@, a calcium channel blocker of the @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@dihydropyridine@@@ type, is widely used in the therapy of these diseases, and has been shown to reduce the progression of the underlying pathophysiological mechanisms, such as @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Eickelberg O, Roth M, Block LH. Effects of amlodipine on gene expression and extracellular matrix formation in human vascular smooth muscle cells and fibroblasts: implications for vascular protection. Int J Cardiol. 1997 Dec 31;62 Suppl 2():S31-7. PMID: 9488193
citations.BibTeX: @article{9488193, title={Effects of amlodipine on gene expression and extracellular matrix formation in human vascular smooth muscle cells and fibroblasts: implications for vascular protection.}, author={Eickelberg O and Roth M and Block LH}, journal={Int J Cardiol}, volume={62 Suppl 2}, pages={S31-7}}
